(e.g. <c1><a2>getAdapterPosition()</a2></c1>, <c3><a4>findViewHolderForAdapterPosition(int)</a4></c3>) You should use these methods when you need to work with up-to-date adapter positions even if they may not have been reflected to layout yet.
(比如 <c1><a2>getAdapterPosition()</a2></c1>，<c3><a4>findViewHolderForAdapterPosition(int)</a4></c3>) 当你需要去使用最新的适配器位置时，你应该使用这些方法，即使这些位置还没有针对布局进行更新。
-- similar, but the endpoints of the chain will not be spread out
-- 类似地，但链的端点将不会被展开
-- the default.
-- 默认的。
-- the elements of the chain will be packed together.
-- 链的元素将被打包到一起。
-- the elements will be spread out
-- 元素将被展开

<a0><c1>ConstraintLayout</c1></a0> allows you to create large and complex layouts with a flat view hierarchy (no nested view groups).

翻译于：20170505 平方X 参考： [1]_SOLID.[译文]使用 ConstraintLayout 构建一个响应式的 UI.http://www.jianshu.com/p/f61227a2775f [2].weiyf.【双语】使用 ConstraintLayout 构建响应式 UI(Build a Responsive UI with ConstraintLayout).https://weiyf.cn/2017/03/10/Build%20a%20Responsive%20UI%20with%20ConstraintLayout/ <a0><c1>ConstraintLayout</c1></a0> 允许您使用平面 view 层次结构创建大而复杂的布局(没有嵌套 view groups)。
<a0><c1>ConstraintLayout</c1></a0> is available in an API library that's compatible with Android 2.3 (API level 9) and higher.

<b0>Note:</b0> <c1>ConstraintLayout</c1> is available as a support library that you can use on Android systems starting with API level 9 (Gingerbread).

<b0>Note:</b0> Because no markup is recognized within a <c1>CDATASection</c1>, character numeric references cannot be used as an escape mechanism when serializing.
<b0>Note:</b0> 由于 <c1>CDATASection</c1> 中未识别出标记，因此在序列化时，字符数字引用不能用作转义机制。

<b0>Note:</b0> One potential solution in the serialization process is to end the CDATA section before the character, output the character using a character reference or entity reference, and open a new CDATA section for any further characters in the text node.
<b0>Note:</b0> 序列化过程中的一个可能的解决方案是在字符前结束 CDATA 部分，使用字符引用或实体引用输出字符，并为文本中的任何其他字符打开新的 CDATA 部分节点。
<b0>Packed:</b0> The views are packed together (after margins are accounted for).
<b0>Packed:</b0> view 被打包在一起(在考虑边距之后)。
<b0>Spread inside:</b0> The first and last view are affixed to the constraints on each end of the chain and the rest are evenly distributed.
<b0>Spread inside:</b0> 第一个和最后一个 view 被附加到链的每个端部上的约束，并且其余的是均匀分布的。
<b0>Spread:</b0> The views are evenly distributed (after margins are accounted for).
<b0>Spread:</b0> view 均匀分布(在考虑边距之后)。
<b0>Video 4.</b0> Creating a chain from the action menu
<b0>Video 4.</b0> 从操作菜单创建链
<b0>Video 5.</b0> Adjusting the constraint bias
<b0>Video 5.</b0> 调整约束编移
<b0>Weighted:</b0> When the chain is set to either <b1>spread</b1> or <b2>spread inside</b2>, you can fill the remaining space by setting one or more views to "match constraints" (<c3>0dp</c3>).
<b0>Weighted:</b0> 当链被设置为 <b1>spread</b1> 或 <b2>spread inside</b2>，您可以通过将一个或多个 view 设置为(<c3>0dp</c3>)来填充剩余空间。

A <c0><a1>NinePatchDrawable</a1></c0> graphic is a stretchable bitmap image, which Android will automatically resize to accommodate the contents of the View in which you have placed it as the background.

A <c0>ConstraintLayout</c0> is a <c1><a2>ViewGroup</a2></c1> which allows you to position and size widgets in a flexible way.
【参考：代码咖啡.细细品读！深入浅出，官方文档看 ConstraintLayout.http://www.jianshu.com/p/38ee0aa654a8】<c0>ConstraintLayout</c0> 是一个 <c1><a2>ViewGroup</a2></c1>，它允许您以灵活的方式定位和设置小部件大小。

A <c0>LayoutManager</c0> is responsible for measuring and positioning item views within a <c1>RecyclerView</c1> as well as determining the policy for when to recycle item views that are no longer visible to the user.
<c0>LayoutManager</c0> 负责在 <c1>RecyclerView</c1> 中测量和定位 item views，同时决定当 item views 对用户不可见时的复用策略。

监听接口，可以附加给 RecylcerView，以在 ViewHolder 添加给 RecyclerView 或移除时获得通知。
A MeasureSpec can be in one of three modes:
MeasureSpec 可以为下 3 种模式之一：
A NinePatch drawable is a standard PNG image that includes an extra 1-pixel-wide border.
NinePatch drawable 是包含 1 像素宽度的边框的标准 PNG 图片。
A PageTransformer is invoked whenever a visible/attached page is scrolled.
PageTransformer 会在一个 visible/attached 的页面滚动时调用。
A Recycler is responsible for managing scrapped or detached item views for reuse.
Recycler 负责管理 scrapped（报废、销毁）或 detached（分离）的 item views 时以用于复用。
A RecyclerListener can be set on a RecyclerView to receive messages whenever a view is recycled.
RecyclerListener 可以设置给 RecyclerView，当 view 被复用时可以收到消息。
A URI path segment.
一个 URI 路径段。
A View occupies a rectangular area on the screen and is responsible for drawing and event handling.
一个 View 占据了屏幕上的一块矩形区域，并负责绘制和事件处理。
A ViewHolder describes an item view and metadata about its place within the RecyclerView.
ViewHolder 描述了在 RecyclerView 中的一个 item view 以及它所在位置的元数据。
A bitmap configuration describes how pixels are stored.
描述像素如何存储的位图配置。
A callback interface that can be used to alter the drawing order of RecyclerView children.
改变 RecyclerView 子控件的绘制顺序的回调接口。
A chain allows you to distribute a group of views horizontally or vertically with the following styles (as shown in figure 14):
链允许您使用以下样式水平或垂直分发一组 view(如图 14 所示)：
A chain is a group of views that are linked to each other with bi-directional position constraints.
链是用双向位置约束彼此链接的一组 view。
A chain works properly only if each end of the chain is constrained to another object on the same axis, as shown in figure 13.
只有链的每一端都被约束到同一轴上的另一个对象，链才能正常工作，如图 13 所示。

一个常见的模式：
A compiled representation of a regular expression.
正则表达式的编译表示。
A content URI allows you to grant read and write access using temporary access permissions.
content URI 允许你使用临时访问权限授予读写访问权限。
A few other things to consider when using chains:
使用链时要考虑的其他几件事：
A flexible view for providing a limited window into a large data set.
参考： 韩曙亮.【Android 应用开发】RecycleView API 翻译 (文档翻译).http://blog.csdn.net/shulianghan/article/details/53514689 一个灵活的 view，使用它可以让一个有限的窗口显示一个大数据集。

A full reference to the kind of restrictions these specifications can require can be found in the reference documentation under <c3><a4>View.onMeasure(int, int)</a4></c3> (this reference documentation does a pretty good job of explaining the whole measurement operation as well).
有关这种规格需要的限制的完整参考，可以在 <c3><a4>View.onMeasure(int, int)</a4></c3> 的参考文档中找到（这个参考也很好的解释了整个测量的操作）。
A helper class to provide the number of spans each item occupies.
一个助手类，它可以提供每个 item 占据的 span 数量。

A loss of network connectivity that has consequences within an app should be logged at the DEBUG or VERBOSE level (depending on whether the consequences are serious enough and unexpected enough to be logged in a release build).
如果失去网络连接后导致在应用内出现某种后果，则应该记录为 DEBUG 或 VERBOSE 级别(具体取决于后果是否足够严重以及足够意外，足以记录在发布版本中)。
A matcher finds matches in a subset of its input called the <i0>region</i0>.
匹配器在其输入的子集（称为 <i0>region</i0> ）中查找匹配项。
A matcher is created from a pattern by invoking the pattern's <c0><a1>matcher</a1></c0> method.
通过调用 pattern 的 <c0><a1>matcher</a1></c0> 方法从 pattern 创建匹配器。
A matcher may be reset explicitly by invoking its <c0><a1>reset()</a1></c0> method or, if a new input sequence is desired, its <c2><a3>reset(CharSequence)</a3></c2> method.
可以通过调用匹配器的 <c0><a1>reset()</a1></c0> 方法来显式重置匹配器，如果需要新输入序列，则调用其 <c2><a3>reset(CharSequence)</a3></c2> 方法。
A more sophisticated component may override even more <c0>on...</c0> methods and introduce some of its own helper methods, substantially customizing its properties and behavior.
一个更复杂的组件可以重写更多的 <c0>on...</c0> 方法，并引入一些自己的助手方法，充分地自定义自己的属性和行为。
A parent view may call measure() more than once on its children.
一个父 view 可能在子 view 上多次调用 measure() 方法。

A partial list of available widgets includes <c0><a1>Button</a1></c0>, <c2><a3>TextView</a3></c2>, <c4><a5>EditText</a5></c4>, <c6><a7>ListView</a7></c6>, <c8><a9>CheckBox</a9></c8>, <c10><a11>RadioButton</a11></c10>, <c12><a13>Gallery</a13></c12>, <c14><a15>Spinner</a15></c14>, and the more special-purpose <c16><a17>AutoCompleteTextView</a17></c16>, <c18><a19>ImageSwitcher</a19></c18>, and <c20><a21>TextSwitcher</a21></c20>.

部分可用的控件列表包括 <c0><a1>Button</a1></c0>, <c2><a3>TextView</a3></c2>, <c4><a5>EditText</a5></c4>, <c6><a7>ListView</a7></c6>, <c8><a9>CheckBox</a9></c8>, <c10><a11>RadioButton</a11></c10>, <c12><a13>Gallery</a13></c12>, <c14><a15>Spinner</a15></c14>，以及更多特殊目的的控件如 <c16><a17>AutoCompleteTextView</a17></c16>, <c18><a19>ImageSwitcher</a19></c18>,<c20><a21>TextSwitcher</a21></c20> 等。
A subclass of Shader is installed in a Paint calling paint.setShader(shader).
Shader 的子类在调用 paint.setShader(shader) 时被安装到 Paint 中。
A subclass of Shader that draws a sweep gradient around a center point.
Shader 的一个子类，它围绕中心点绘制一个渐变扫区。
A subclass of shader that returns the composition of two other shaders, combined by an <c0><a1>Xfermode</a1></c0> subclass.
组合着色器，着色器的一个子类，它返回两个其他着色器的组合，由 <c0><a1>Xfermode</a1></c0> 的子类组合。
A subclass overrides the <c0>finalize</c0> method to dispose of system resources or to perform other cleanup.
子类会覆盖 <c0>finalize</c0> 方法来处理系统资源或执行其他清理。
A useful aspect of <c0>ConstraintLayout</c0> is in how it deals with "impossible" constrains.
<c0>ConstraintLayout</c0> 一个有用的方面是如何处理 "不可能" 的约束。
A view actually possess two pairs of width and height values.
一个 view 实际上控制两对宽高值。
A view can be a part of both a horizontal and a vertical chain, making it easy to build flexible grid layouts.
view 可以是水平和垂直链的一部分，使得构建灵活的网格布局变得容易。
A view has a location, expressed as a pair of <e0>left</e0> and <e1>top</e1> coordinates, and two dimensions, expressed as a width and a height.
view 有一个位置，表示为一对 <e0>left</e0> 和 <e1>top</e1> 坐标，以及两个尺寸，表示为宽和高。
A view's measured width and measured height values must respect the constraints imposed by the view's parents.
view 的 measured width 和 measured height 值，必须尊守父类给的限制。

Add ConstraintLayout to your project
添加 ConstraintLayout 到我们的项目中
Add a constraint
添加约束
Add a listener that will be notified of any changes in scroll state or position.
添加一个监听器, 作用是当滚动状态 或者 位置发生变化时得到相应的通知。
Add a view to the currently attached RecyclerView if needed.
如果需要，添加一个 view 到当前附加的 RecyclerVidew 上。
Add an <c0><a1>RecyclerView.ItemDecoration</a1></c0> to this RecyclerView.
给该 RecyclerView 添加 <c0><a1>RecyclerView.ItemDecoration</a1></c0>。
Add an <c0><a1>RecyclerView.OnItemTouchListener</a1></c0> to intercept touch events before they are dispatched to child views or this view's standard scrolling behavior.
添加一个 <c0><a1>RecyclerView.OnItemTouchListener</a1></c0> 用于拦截触摸事件，在这些事件被分发给子 view 或该 view 的标准滚动行为之前。
Add me to the mailing list for the monthly newsletter and occasional emails about development and Google Play opportunities.
Add me to the mailing list for the monthly newsletter and occasional emails about development and Google Play opportunities.
Added in <a0>API level 1</a0>
添加于 <a0>API level 1</a0>
Additionally, we have not yet determined how to make all IDEs use the same ordering.
此外，我们还没有确定如何让所有 IDE 都使用同一种顺序。
Adds a view to a horizontal chain.
将 view 添加到水平链。
Adds a view to a vertical chain.
将 view 添加到垂直链。
Adds any focusable views that are descendants of this view (possibly including this view if it is focusable itself) to views.
将该 view（调用该方法的 view）的所有可获取焦点的子 view（可能包含自己，如果自己也是可获取焦点的。）添加到 views（指第一个参数）。
Adds the source and destination pixels, then subtracts the source pixels multiplied by the destination.
添加源像素和目标像素，然后减去源像素乘以目标像素。
Adds the source pixels to the destination pixels and saturates the result.
将源像素添加到目标像素并使结果饱和。
Adjacent <c3>CDATASection</c3> nodes are not merged by use of the <c4>normalize</c4> method of the <c5>Node</c5> interface.
通过使用 <c5>Node</c5> 接口的 <c4>normalize</c4> 方法，不会合并相邻的 <c3>CDATASection</c3> 节点。
Adjust the alpha of a view.
调整视图的透明度。
Adjust the constraint bias
调整约束偏差
Adjust the elevation of a view.
调整 view 的 elevation。
Adjust the horizontal bias of the view (used with views constrained on left and right).
调整 view 的水平偏移(与 view 的左右限制一起使用)。
Adjust the post-layout X translation of a view.
调整 view 布局后的 X 方向移动。
Adjust the post-layout Y translation of a view.
调整 view 布局后的 Y 方向移动。
Adjust the post-layout rotation about the X axis of a view.
调整 view 布局后 X 轴的旋转。
Adjust the post-layout rotation about the Y axis of a view.
调整 view 布局后 Y 轴的旋转。
Adjust the post-layout scale in X of a view.
调整 view 布局后 X 轴的缩放。
Adjust the post-layout scale in Y of a view.
调整 view 布局后 Y 轴的缩放。
Adjust the post-layout translation of a view.
调整 view 布局后的移动。
Adjust the translation in Z of a view.
调整 view 布局后的 Z 方向移动。
Adjust the vertical bias of the view (used with views constrained on left and right).
调整 view 的垂直方向的偏移（用于上下限制的 view）（译注：原文可能不对）。
Adjust the view margins
调整 view 边距
Adjust the view size
调整 view 的大小
Adjust the visibility of a view.
调整 view 的可见性。
Admittedly this is a simple case, but that's the point — creating custom components is only as complicated as you need it to be.
诚然，这只是一个简单的例子，但关键是——创建自定义 view 你需要有多复杂，就创建成多复杂。
After that any object (other than a bitmap) that is drawn with that paint will get its color(s) from the shader.
之后，用该 paint 绘制的任何对象（除 bitmap 之外）都将从 shader 中获取它的颜色。

After the <c0>finalize</c0> method has been invoked for an object, no further action is taken until the Java virtual machine has again determined that there is no longer any means by which this object can be accessed by any thread that has not yet died, including possible actions by other objects or classes which are ready to be finalized, at which point the object may be discarded.
在为对象调用 <c0>finalize</c0> 方法后，不会采取进一步的操作，直到 Java 虚拟机再次确定这个对象不再被任何尚未死亡的线程访问，除非是由于某个其他准备 finalize 的对象或类的准备而产生的动作的结果，此时物体可能会被丢弃。
After this, the drawing commands of the entire tree are issued to screen, clipped to the newly damaged area.
然后，整个 view 树的绘制命令向屏幕发出，裁去被破坏的区域。
Align the edge of a view to the same edge of another view.
将 view 的边缘与另一个 view 的相同边缘对齐。
Align the text baseline of a view to the text baseline of another view.
将 view 的文本基线与另一个 view 的文本基线对齐。
Alignment
对齐

All ItemDecorations are drawn in the order they were added, before the item views (in <c0><a1>onDraw()</a1></c0> and after the items (in <c2><a3>onDrawOver(Canvas, RecyclerView, RecyclerView.State)</a3></c2>.
所有的 ItemDecorations 按它们加入的顺序被绘制，在 item views 之前(在 <c0><a1>onDraw()</a1></c0> 中且在 items 之后 (在 <c2><a3>onDrawOver(Canvas, RecyclerView, RecyclerView.State)</a3></c2> 中。
All margins offered by the tool are factors of 8dp to help your views align to Material Design's <a0>8dp square grid recommendations</a0>.
该工具提供的所有边距默认是 8dp，以帮助你的 view 符合 Material Design 的 <a0>8dp square grid recommendations</a0> 建议。
All of the views in a window are arranged in a single tree.
窗体中所有的 view 被排在一个树结构上。
All string literals in Java programs, such as <c1>"abc"</c1>, are implemented as instances of this class.
Java 程序中的所有字符串字面值（如 <c1>"abc"</c1> ）都作为此类的实例实现。
All the example diagrams presented below use the same source and destination images:
下面介绍的所有示例图都使用相同的源图像和目标图像：
All the power of <c0>ConstraintLayout</c0> is available directly from the Layout Editor's visual tools, because the layout API and the Layout Editor were specially built for each other.
<c0>ConstraintLayout</c0> 的所有功能都可以从布局编辑器的可视化工具中直接获得，因为布局 API 和布局编辑器是专为彼此构建的。
All the string building for the log also needs to be placed inside the <c4>if (LOCAL_LOG)</c4> block.
为日志编译的所有字符串也需要放在 <c4>if (LOCAL_LOG)</c4> 块中。
Alpha compositing modes
Alpha 合成模式
Alpha set to 0xFF.
Alpha 设置为 0xFF。
Alphabetical within each grouping, with capital letters before lower case letters (e.g. Z before a).
每个分组内按字母顺序排序，其中大写字母开头的语句位于小写字母开头的语句前面(例如 Z 在 a 前面)。
Also see <c0><a1>ConstraintLayout.LayoutParams</a1></c0> for layout attributes
另请参阅 <c0><a1>ConstraintLayout.LayoutParams</a1></c0> 的布局属性。
Alternatively, you can use the pre-3.0 animation classes to animate how Views are rendered.
当然，你也可以用 3.0 以前的动画类来按制 view 的渲染。
Alternatives to catching generic Exception:
捕获常规异常的替代方案：
Although a missing constraint won't cause a compilation error, the Layout Editor indicates missing constraints as an error in the toolbar.
尽管缺少了约束也不会造成编译错误，布局编辑器将会在工具栏上显示有一个缺少约束的错误。
Although the orientation of a chain is either vertical or horizontal, using one does not align the views in that direction.
虽然链的取向是垂直或水平的，无论使用哪一个一个方向都不会使该方向上的视图对齐。
Among the layouts available are <c0><a1>LinearLayout</a1></c0>, <c2><a3>FrameLayout</a3></c2>, <c4><a5>RelativeLayout</a5></c4>, and others.
可用的布局包括 <c0><a1>LinearLayout</a1></c0>, <c2><a3>FrameLayout</a3></c2>, <c4><a5>RelativeLayout</a5></c4> 及其他。
An ItemDecoration allows the application to add a special drawing and layout offset to specific item views from the adapter's data set.
ItemDecoration 允许应用为特定的 item view（来自 adapter 的数据集）添加一个特殊的绘制和布局偏移。

An OnItemTouchListener allows the application to intercept touch events in progress at the view hierarchy level of the RecyclerView before those touch events are considered for RecyclerView's own scrolling behavior.
OnItemTouchListener 允许应用程序在 RecyclerView 自己的滚动行为被考虑之前，在 RecyclerView 的视图层次结构级别拦截正在进行的触摸事件。
An OnScrollListener can be added to a RecyclerView to receive messages when a scrolling event has occurred on that RecyclerView.
OnScrollListener 可以添加给 RecyclerView 以在该 RecyclerView 发生滚动事件时接收消息。
An app may set this to false to indicate that the fragment's UI is scrolled out of visibility or is otherwise not directly visible to the user.
一个应用可能会设置它为 false 以指明 Fragment 的 UI 滚出了可见或者对用户不是直接可见的。
An engine that performs match operations on a <c0><a1></c0>character sequence<c2></a1></c2> by interpreting a <c3><a4>Pattern</a4></c3>.
通过解释 <c3><a4>Pattern</a4></c3> 对 <c0><a1></c0>character sequence<c2></a1></c2> 执行匹配操作的引擎。
An event comes in and is dispatched to the appropriate view.
收到一个事件然后分发给适当的 view。
An example use of a NinePatch is the backgrounds used by standard Android buttons — buttons must stretch to accommodate strings of various lengths.
标准的安卓按钮就是使用 NinePatch 作为背景的例子——按钮需要缩放以适应字符串长度的变化。
An excellent tutorial and overview of regular expressions is <a0><i1>Mastering Regular Expressions</i1>, Jeffrey E. F. Friedl, O'Reilly and Associates, 1997.</a0>
有关正则表达式的优秀教程和概述，请参阅 <a0><i1>Mastering Regular Expressions</i1>, Jeffrey E. F. Friedl, O'Reilly and Associates, 1997.</a0>
An explicit exception is made for java standard libraries (<c1>java.util.*</c1>, <c2>java.io.*</c2>, etc.) and unit test code (<c3>junit.framework.*</c3>).
不过导入 java 标准库（<c1>java.util.*</c1>、 <c2>java.io.*</c2> 等）和单元测试代码 (<c3>junit.framework.*</c3>）时可以例外。（译注：这里和官方汉化不一致，官方汉化为“在 Java 标准库（java.util.*、java.io.* 等）和单元测试代码 (junit.framework.*) 中创建显式异常。”）。
An implementation of <c0><a1>RecyclerView.OnItemTouchListener</a1></c0> that has empty method bodies and default return values.
<c0><a1>RecyclerView.OnItemTouchListener</a1></c0> 的一个实现，只有空的方法体和默认的返回值。
An instance of the <c0><a1>Pattern</a1></c0> class represents a regular expression that is specified in string form in a syntax similar to that used by Perl.
<c0><a1>Pattern</a1></c0> 类的实例采用类似于 Perl 的语法来表示以字符串形式指定的正则表达式。
An overridden <c0>onDraw()</c0> method to draw the label onto the provided canvas.
重写 <c0>onDraw()</c0> 方法，在提供的画布上画出标签。
An overridden <c0>onMeasure</c0> method to determine and set the rendering size of the component.
重写 <c0>onMeasure</c0> 方法来确定和设置组件呈现的大小。

Android does not currently enforce a specific style for writing Javadoc comments, but you should follow the instructions <a0>How to Write Doc Comments for the Javadoc Tool</a0>.
Android 目前并不强制要求采用特定样式来编写 Javadoc 备注，但建议您参照 <a0>How to Write Doc Comments for the Javadoc Tool</a0> 中的说明。
Android doesn't use finalizers.
Android 不使用终结器。
Android follows standard Java coding conventions with the additional rules described below.
Android 遵循标准 Java 编码规范以及下文所述的其他规则。
Android imports
导入 Android 包
Android offers a sophisticated and powerful componentized model for building your UI, based on the fundamental layout classes: <c0><a1>View</a1></c0> and <c2><a3>ViewGroup</a3></c2>.
基于基本的布局类： <c0><a1>View</a1></c0> 和 <c2><a3>ViewGroup</a3></c2>，安卓提供了一套精致而强大的组件化模型来构建你的 UI。
Android standard practices for the three predefined annotations in Java are:
Java 中 3 个预定义注释的 Android 标准做法如下：
AnimRes
AnimRes
AnimRes - Android SDK | Android Developers
AnimRes - Android SDK | Android Developers
Animate a scroll by the given amount of pixels along either axis.
通过给定的各坐标轴的像素值，来进行平滑的滚动。

动画

Annotations
Annotations should precede other modifiers for the same language element.
注释应该位于同一语言元素的其他修饰符之前。
Any change you make to the default margin applies only to the views you add from then on.
你对默认边距所做的任何更改仅适用于你之后添加的 view。
Any content drawn by this method will be drawn after the item views are drawn and will thus appear over the views.
该方法绘制的任何内容将在 item views 绘制之后被绘制，因此将显示在 views 的上层。
Any content drawn by this method will be drawn before the item views are drawn, and will thus appear underneath the views.
该方法绘制的任何内容将在 item views 绘制之前被绘制，因此将显示在 views 的下层。
Any exception thrown by the <c0>finalize</c0> method causes the finalization of this object to be halted, but is otherwise ignored.
由 <c0>finalize</c0> 方法抛出的任何异常都会导致此对象的终止被暂停，但会被忽略。
Any logging that is meant to be read by other people and to be available in release builds should be terse without being cryptic, and should be reasonably understandable.
任何供其他人阅读并且在发布版本中提供的日志记录都应当简洁明了、合理易懂。
Any non-negative integer smaller than or equal to the value returned by this method is guaranteed to be a valid group index for this matcher.

Drawing is handled by walking the tree and recording the drawing commands of any View that needs to update.
绘制操作，先遍厉一遍 view 树，记录需要更新的 view 的绘制命令。
Draws remaining destination pixels over source pixels.
剩余的目标像素绘制在源像素上。

During this pass each parent is responsible for positioning all of its children using the sizes computed in the measure pass.
在这个过程中，每个父 view 负责它所有的子 view 的定位，它使用测量过程的尺寸结果。
END aligns the result to the right and bottom edges of dst.
END 将结果与 dst 的右边和底边对齐。
EXACTLY: This is used by the parent to impose an exact size on the child.
EXACTLY：用于父 view 强加给子 view 一个确切的尺寸。
Each channel (RGB and alpha for translucency) is stored with 8 bits of precision (256 possible values.) This configuration is very flexible and offers the best quality.
每个通道(用于半透明的 RGB 和 alpha)都以 8 位精度(256 个可能值)进行存储。此配置非常灵活，可提供最佳质量。
Each component ranges between 0..255 with 0 meaning no contribution for that component, and 255 meaning 100% contribution.
每个组件的范围在 0..255 之间，0 表示对该组件没有贡献，255 表示 100％贡献。
Each constraint defines the view's position along either the vertical or horizontal axis; so each view must have a minimum of one constraint for each axis, but often more are necessary.
每一个约束都定义了 View 在水平或垂直方向的位置：因此每一个 View 与轴线（垂直和水平方向）都至少应该有一个约束。
Each constraint handle can be used for just one constraint, but you can create multiple constraints (from different views) to the same anchor point.
每个约束句柄只能用于一个约束，但你可以创建多个约束(从不同的 view)到同一个定位点。
Each constraint represents a connection or alignment to another view, the parent layout, or an invisible guideline.
每一个约束表示到另一个 view，父布局，或者不可见的参考线的连接或者对齐。
Each field of <c0>outRect</c0> specifies the number of pixels that the item view should be inset by, similar to padding or margin.
<c0>outRect</c0> 的每一个字段指定了 item view 应该内凹的像素值，类似于 padding 或 margin。
Each line of text in your code should be at most 100 characters long.
您的代码中每一行文本的长度都应该不超过 100 个字符。
Each of these methods returns a boolean indicating success or failure.
每个方法都返回一个表示成功或失败的布尔值。
Each pixel is stored as a single translucency (alpha) channel.
每个像素都存储为单个半透明(alpha)通道。

Each pixel is stored on 2 bytes and only the RGB channels are encoded: red is stored with 5 bits of precision (32 possible values), green is stored with 6 bits of precision (64 possible values) and blue is stored with 5 bits of precision.
每个像素存储在 2 个字节上，并且只有 RGB 通道被编码：红色以 5 位精度(32 个可能值)存储，绿色以 6 位精度(64 个可能值)存储，蓝色以 5 位精度。
Each pixel is stored on 2 bytes.
每个像素都存储在 2 个字节中。
Each pixel is stored on 4 bytes.
每个像素存储在 4 个字节中。
Each variable should be declared in the innermost block that encloses all uses of the variable.
每个变量应该在包含变量所有使用场合的最内层的块中进行声明。
Each view pushes dimension specifications down the tree during the recursion.
在递归中每个 view 把尺寸规格向下推。Each view pushes dimension specifications down the tree during the recursion.

If you instead want the view to stretch its size to meet the constraints, <a0>switch the size to "match constraints"</a0>; or if you want to keep the current size but move the view so that it is not centered, <a1>adjust the constraint bias</a1>.

Since RecyclerView is a collection ViewGroup that includes virtual children (items that are in the Adapter but not visible in the UI), it employs a more involved focus search strategy that differs from other ViewGroups.
因为 RecyclerView 是包含虚拟子 view(adapter 中的子 view 但 UI 不可见)的 ViewGroup 集合，因此它采用了与其他 ViewGroups 考虑更多的焦点搜索策略。

So a vertical plane (the left and right sides) of a view can be constrained only to another vertical plane; and baselines can constrain only to other baselines.

So the view with the highest weight value gets the most amount of space; views that have the same weight get the same amount of space.
因此，具有最高权重值的 view 获得最大的空间量;具有相同重量的 view 获得相同的空间量。

<c3>finalize</c3> 方法可以采取任何操作，包括使该对象再次可用于其他线程;然而，<c4>finalize</c4> 的通常目的是在对象被不可撤销地丢弃之前执行清理操作。

匹配器的显式状态最初是未定义的； 在成功匹配前尝试查询其中的任何部分将抛出 <c0><a1>IllegalStateException</a1></c0> 。

The general contract of <c0>finalize</c0> is that it is invoked if and when the Java<f1><s2>TM</s2></f1> virtual machine has determined that there is no longer any means by which this object can be accessed by any thread that has not yet died, except as a result of an action taken by the finalization of some other object or class which is ready to be finalized.
<c0>finalize</c0> 的通用协议是它的执行时机为，如果 Java <f1><s2>TM</s2></f1> 虚拟机确定这个对象不再被任何尚未死亡的线程访问，除非是由于某个其他准备 finalize 的对象或类的准备而产生的动作的结果。
The geometry of a view is that of a rectangle.
view 的几何图形是一个矩形。
The golden rule of logging is that your logs may not unnecessarily push other logs out of the buffer, just as others may not push out yours.
日志记录的黄金法则是，您的日志不一定要将其他日志排挤出缓冲区，正如其他日志不会这样对您的日志一样。
The hash code of a member-value depends on its type:
成员值的哈希码取决于其类型：

The hash code of a primitive value <t0><i1>v</i1></t0> is equal to <t2><i3>WrapperType</i3>.valueOf(<i4>v</i4>).hashCode()</t2>, where <t5><i6>WrapperType</i6></t5> is the wrapper type corresponding to the primitive type of <t7><i8>v</i8></t7> (<c9><a10>Byte</a10></c9>, <c11><a12>Character</a12></c11>, <c13><a14>Double</a14></c13>, <c15><a16>Float</a16></c15>, <c17><a18>Integer</a18></c17>, <c19><a20>Long</a20></c19>, <c21><a22>Short</a22></c21>, or <c23><a24>Boolean</a24></c23>).

基本类型的哈希码 <t0><i1>v</i1></t0> 等于 <t2><i3>WrapperType</i3>.valueOf(<i4>v</i4>).hashCode()</t2> ， <t5><i6>WrapperType</i6></t5> 是基本类型 <t7><i8>v</i8></t7> 对应的包装类型 (<c9><a10>Byte</a10></c9>, <c11><a12>Character</a12></c11>, <c13><a14>Double</a14></c13>, <c15><a16>Float</a16></c15>, <c17><a18>Integer</a18></c17>, <c19><a20>Long</a20></c19>, <c21><a22>Short</a22></c21>, 或者 <c23><a24>Boolean</a24></c23>)。

使用此类代码时，可以继续遵循现有样式。

When writing a <c0><a1>RecyclerView.LayoutManager</a1></c0> you almost always want to use layout positions whereas when writing an <c2><a3>RecyclerView.Adapter</a3></c2>, you probably want to use adapter positions.
当你在写 <c0><a1>RecyclerView.LayoutManager</a1></c0> 时，你几乎总是想要使用 layout positions，反之当写 <c2><a3>RecyclerView.Adapter</a3></c2> 时，你几乎总是想要使用 adapter positions。

When you add a constraint to both sides of a view (and the view size for the same dimension is either "fixed" or "wrap content"), the view becomes centered between the two constraints with a bias of 50% by default.
当向 view 的两侧添加约束时(并且 view 的尺寸的大小为 "fixed" 或 "wrap content")，默认情况下，view 将在两个约束之间居中，偏差为 50%。
When you add a view in a <c1>ConstraintLayout</c1>, it displays a bounding box with square resizing handles on each corner and circular constraint handles on each side.
当你在 <c1>ConstraintLayout</c1> 中添加一个 view 时，它会显示一个边框，每个角上都有方形调整大小的手柄，每边都有圆形的约束手柄。
When you call <c10><a11>Intent.setFlags()</a11></c10> on the <c12><a13>Intent</a13></c12> to set temporary access permissions, the same permissions are applied to all of the content URIs.
在 <c12><a13>Intent</a13></c12> 上调用 <c10><a11>Intent.setFlags()</a11></c10> 来设置临时访问权限时，将应用相同的权限到所有的 content URI。
When you create an <c0><a1>Intent</a1></c0> containing a content URI, in order to send the content URI to a client app, you can also call <c2><a3>Intent.setFlags()</a3></c2> to add permissions.
当您创建包含 content URI 的 <c0><a1>Intent</a1></c0> 时，为了将 content URI 发送到客户端应用程序，还可以调用 <c2><a3>Intent.setFlags()</a3></c2> 添加权限。
When you drop a view into the Layout Editor, it stays where you leave it even if it has no constraints.
当你拖动一个 view 到布局编辑器中，它会停留在你放开它的地方，即使它没有任何约束。
When you release, the constraint is made, with <a0>a default margin</a0> separating the two views.
当你松开时，约束就会创建，两个 view 间用 <a0>a default margin</a0> 隔开。
When you use this approach, you can add multiple <c6><a7>ClipData</a7></c6> objects to the <c8><a9>Intent</a9></c8>, each with its own content URI.
当你使用这种方法时，你可以添加多个 <c6><a7>ClipData</a7></c6> 对象到 <c8><a9>Intent</a9></c8> ，每个都有其自己的 content URI 。
When you want to use class Bar from package foo,there are two possible ways to import it:
当您想要使用 foo 包中的 Bar 类时，可以使用以下两种方式导入：
While both have default behavior, the default <c2>onDraw()</c2> will do nothing, and the default <c3>onMeasure()</c3> will always set a size of 100x100 — which is probably not what you want.
虽然这 2 个方法都有默认的行为，默认的 <c2>onDraw()</c2> 什么也不做，默认的 <c3>onMeasure()</c3> 将设置尺寸为 100x100 — 这可能并不是你想的。

While inPurgeable can help avoid big Dalvik heap allocations (from API level 11 onward), it sacrifices performance predictability since any image that the view system tries to draw may incur a decode delay which can lead to dropped frames.
虽然 inPurgeable 可以帮助避免大 Dalvik 堆分配(从 API 级别 11 开始)，但它牺牲了性能可预测性，因为视图系统尝试绘制的任何图像都可能导致解码延迟，从而导致丢帧。
While logging is necessary, it has a significantly negative impact on performance and quickly loses its usefulness if not kept reasonably terse.
虽然日志记录非常有必要，但对性能却有明显的负面影响，如果不能保持一定程度的简洁性，就会迅速失去其实用性。
While much discussion has surrounded this rule, the decision remains that 100 characters is the maximum <e0>with the following exceptions</e0>:
虽然关于此规则存在很多争论，但最终决定仍是以 100 个字符为上限，<e0>with the following exceptions</e0>：
While the <c0>name</c0> attribute is a URI path segment, the <c1>path</c1> value is an actual subdirectory name.
虽然 <c0>name</c0> 属性是一个 URI 路径段，但 <c1>path</c1> 值是一个实际的子目录名称。
While they can be handy for doing cleanup (particularly of external resources), there are no guarantees as to when a finalizer will be called (or even that it will be called at all).
虽然终结器非常便于进行资源清理(尤其是外部资源)，但并不能保证终结器何时被调用(甚至根本不会被调用)。

While you may think your code will never encounter this error condition or that it is not important to handle it, ignoring exceptions as above creates mines in your code for someone else to trigger some day.
虽然您可能认为自己的代码永远不会遇到这种错误，或者无需费心处理这种错误，但像上例那样忽略异常会在您的代码中埋下隐患，这种错误总有一天会被他人触发。
Widgets can then be constrained to a Guideline, allowing multiple widgets to be positioned easily from one Guideline, or allowing reactive layout behavior by using percent positioning.
然后，部件可以由 Guideline 限制，允许多个部件根据 Guideline 轻松地定位，或通过百分比定位来允许响应式布局。
Widgets can then be positioned by constraining them to such guidelines.
然后部件可以通过这样的 guideline 来约束定位。
Widgets dimension constraints
小部件尺寸约束
With this configuration, each pixel requires 1 byte of memory.
采用这种配置，每个像素需要 1 个字节的内存。
Within a given module, other than at the VERBOSE level, an error should only be reported once if possible.
在指定模块中，除了 VERBOSE 级别之外，一个错误应该只报告一次（如果可能的话）。

Within a single chain of function calls within a module, only the innermost function should return the error, and callers in the same module should only add some logging if that significantly helps to isolate the issue.
在模块内的单个函数调用链中，只有最内层的函数应当返回错误，同一模块中的调用者只能添加一些明显有助于隔离问题的日志记录。
WorkerThread
WorkerThread
WorkerThread - Android SDK | Android Developers
WorkerThread - Android SDK | Android Developers
Write Short Methods
编写简短方法
Write a compressed version of the bitmap to the specified outputstream.
将位图的压缩版本写入指定的输出流。
Xfermode is the base class for objects that are called to implement custom "transfer-modes" in the drawing pipeline.
Xfermode 是被调用来在绘图管道中实现自定义 "传输模式" 的对象的基类。
XmlRes
XmlRes
XmlRes - Android SDK | Android Developers
XmlRes - Android SDK | Android Developers
You can add a vertical or horizontal guideline to which you can constrain views, and the guideline will be invisible to app users.
你可以添加可以约束 view 的垂直或者水平的参考线，并且该参考线对于应用用户而言是不可见的。
You can add views either from code or by specifying a tree of views in one or more XML layout files.
你即可以通过代码添加 view，也可以在一个或多个 XML 文件中申明 view 树。

You can also create listeners for events that your contained views might generate, for example, a listener method for the List Item Click Listener to update the contents of the EditText if a list selection is made.
你也可以监听器来临听内部容纳的 view 产生的事件，比如如果设置了 list 选项，可以设置 List Item 的点击监听器来更新 EditText 的内容。
You can also define an optional drawable section of the image (effectively, the padding lines) by drawing a line on the right and bottom lines.
你可以选择，通过在右边框或上边框画线，来定义图片的绘制区域，(本质上，就是 paddding 线。)。
You can also define one dimension of a widget as a ratio of the other one.
你还可以把一个小部件的一个尺寸定义为相对于另一个的比例。
You can also put the content URI in a <c0><a1>ClipData</a1></c0> object and then add the object to an <c2><a3>Intent</a3></c2> you send to a client app.
您也可以将 content URI 放在 <c0><a1>ClipData</a1></c0> 对象中，然后将该对象添加到发送给客户端应用的 <c2><a3>Intent</a3></c2> 。
You can also select all the views you want to align, and then click <b0>Align</b0> <i1> in the toolbar to select the alignment type.
你还可以选择所有要对齐的 view，然后单击工具栏中的 <b0>Align</b0> <i1>来选择对齐方式。
You can also use ratio if both dimensions are set to <c0>MATCH_CONSTRAINT</c0> (0dp).
如果两个尺寸均设置为 <c0>MATCH_CONSTRAINT</c0> (0dp)，也可以使用比例。
You can attach an <c0><a1>Animation</a1></c0> object to a view using <c2><a3>setAnimation(Animation)</a3></c2> or <c4><a5>startAnimation(Animation)</a5></c4>.
你可以给 view 附加一个 <c0><a1>Animation</a1></c0> 对象，用 <c2><a3>setAnimation(Animation)</a3></c2> 或 <c4><a5>startAnimation(Animation)</a5></c4> 方法。
You can change it by providing a custom <c0><a1>GridLayoutManager.SpanSizeLookup</a1></c0> instance via <c2><a3>setSpanSizeLookup(SpanSizeLookup)</a3></c2>.
你可以改变它通过提供自定义的 <c0><a1>GridLayoutManager.SpanSizeLookup</a1></c0> 实例，通过 <c2><a3>setSpanSizeLookup(SpanSizeLookup)</a3></c2>。
You can change the way the height and width are calculated by clicking the symbols indicated with callout <s0>3</s0> in figure 10.
你可以通过单击图 10 中标注 <s0>3</s0> 所示的符号来更改计算高度和宽度的方式。
You can constrain a widget on the horizontal and vertical axis:
您可以在水平和垂直轴上约束小部件：
You can control this behavior via <c0><a1>setGapStrategy(int)</a1></c0>.
你可以通过 <c0><a1>setGapStrategy(int)</a1></c0> 控制这种行为。
You can create constraints only between a constraint handle and an anchor point that share the same plane.
只能在共享的同一平面的约束句柄和锚点之间创建约束。
You can define the distance from the edge with margin.
你可以使用 margin 定义到边缘的距离。

You can do all of the things you would do with a fully customized component, but by starting with a more specialized class in the View hierarchy, you can also get a lot of behavior for free that probably does exactly what you want.
一个完全自定义的可以做的，继承一个更特定的 view 也可以做，而且你还能免费获得更多的行为，也许正是你想要的行为。
You can have as many stretchable sections as you want: their relative size stays the same, so the largest sections always remain the largest.
你可以有任意多的可伸缩部分，它们的将保持相对的大小，所以最大的部分始终是最大的。
You can offset the alignment by dragging the view inward from the constraint.
您可以通过从视图向内拖动约束来偏移对齐。
You can position the guideline within the layout based on either dp units or percent, relative to the layout's edge.
你可以根据相对于布局边缘的 dp 单位或者百分百在布局中定位参考线。
You can register such a listener using <c1><a2>setOnFocusChangeListener(android.view.View.OnFocusChangeListener)</a2></c1>.
你可以注册这样一监听器，使用 <c1><a2>setOnFocusChangeListener(android.view.View.OnFocusChangeListener)</a2></c1>。
You can rely on these positions to be consistent with what user is currently seeing on the screen.
你可以依赖这些位置, 这些位置与用户当前在屏幕上看到的位置是一致的。
You can see some sample usages of the LabelView custom View in <a0>custom_view_1.xml</a0> from the samples.
你可在示例中的 <a0>custom_view_1.xml</a0> 文件中看到一些使用示例。
You can send the content URI returned by <c6><a7>getUriForFile()</a7></c6> to another app in an <c8><a9>Intent</a9></c8>.
您可以将由 <c6><a7>getUriForFile()</a7></c6> 返回的 content URI 放到 <c8><a9>Intent</a9></c8> 中发送给其他应用程序。
You can set the view size to a ratio such as 16:9 if at least one of the view dimensions is set to "match constraints" (<c0>0dp</c0>).
如果至少有一个 view 尺寸设置为 "match constraints" (<c0>0dp</c0>)，则可以将 view 大小设置为比例，例如 16:9。
You can specify the layout using the declarative XML files just like with an activity screen, or you can create views programmatically and nest them into the layout from your code.
就像 Activity 一样，你可以在 XML 文件中申明布局，也可以通过编程的方式用代码嵌套。

You can supply a constructor which can take attributes and parameters from the XML, and you can also consume your own such attributes and parameters (perhaps the color and range of the VU meter, or the width and damping of the needle, etc.)
你可以提供一个构造方法来从 XML 文件中获取属性和参数，你也可以使用这些属性和参数(比如 VU 表范围的颜色，指针的宽度和阻尼等)。
You can then adjust the whole chain's bias (left/right or up/down) by changing the chain's head view bias.
然后，您可以通过更改链头 view 的偏差来调整整个链的偏差(左/右或上/下)。
You can use constraints to achieve different types of layout behavior, as described in the following sections.
你可以使用约束来实现不同类型的布局行为，如一下各章节所述。
You can use the corner handles to resize a view, but this hard codes the size so the view will not resize for different content or screen sizes.
你可以使用拐角手柄来调整 view 大小，但这样会硬编码大小，因此 view 不会调整为不同的内容或屏幕尺寸大小。
You can't share a single file by its file name, nor can you specify a subset of files using wildcards.
您不能按文件名共享单个文件，也不能使用通配符指定文件的子集。
You could capture other events like key presses and handle them in some custom way (such as for a game).
你可以捕获其他事件，比如按键，并且自己处理事件(比如在游戏中)。

You could combine a group of View components into a new single component, perhaps to make something like a ComboBox (a combination of popup list and free entry text field), a dual-pane selector control (a left and right pane with a list in each where you can re-assign which item is in which list), and so on.
你可以用一组 View 组件组成一个新的单一组件，比如类似于一个 ComboBox（弹出窗口列表和一个自由输入的文本框的组合）、一个双窗口的选择控制器（左右窗口各有一个列表，你可以重新分配哪些 item 是在所选列表中）等等。（译注：第二个比如日类似日期、时间选择的那种）。
You could create a completely custom-rendered View type, for example a "volume control" knob rendered using 2D graphics, and which resembles an analog electronic control.
你可以创建完全自己渲染的 View 类，比如一个用 2D 图呈现的 "音量控制" 旋扭。
You could override the way that an EditText component is rendered on the screen (the <a0>Notepad Tutorial</a0> uses this to good effect, to create a lined-notepad page).
你可以重写 EditText 在屏幕上呈现的方式(<a0>Notepad Tutorial</a0> 使用这点创建一个按行排的记事本，效果良好)。
You do not need to override all of these methods.
你不需要重写所有的方法。
You do not need to write Javadoc for trivial get and set methods such as <c0>setFoo()</c0> if all your Javadoc would say is "sets Foo".
对于普通的 get 和 set 方法(如 setFoo())，您无需编写 Javadoc，要写也不过是 "设置 Foo"。
You indicate a stretchable section by drawing one (or more) 1-pixel-wide black line(s) in the left and top part of the border (the other border pixels should be fully transparent or white).
你可以通过在左边框或上边框，画一段或多段 1 像素宽的黑线，来指明可伸缩的部分。（其他的边框像素应该完全透明或是白色）。
You might also create your own properties with accessors and modifiers, for example, allow the EditText value to be set initially in the component and query for its contents when needed.
你也可以创建你自己属性的访问和修改方法，比如允许设置 EditText 的初始值获当需要时获取它的内容。（译注：allow the EditText value to be set initially in the component and query for its contents when needed，我也不知道是获取初始值的内容还是 EditText 的内容，反正影响不大。）。
You might need to make some adjustments to be sure the layout responds as you intend for different screen sizes and orientations.
您可能需要进行一些调整，以确保布局响应您打算为不同的屏幕尺寸和方向。
You might override other <c0>on...</c0> methods, like <c1>onKeyDown()</c1>, to perhaps choose certain default values from the popup list of a combo box when a certain key is pressed.
你可能要重写一些 <c0>on...</c0> 方法，比如重写 <c1>onKeyDown()</c1> 方法，当某个按键按下时，从 combo box 的 popup list 中选择某个值。

You must always be on the UI thread when calling any method on any view.</e0> If you are doing work on other threads and want to update the state of a view from that thread, you should use a <c1><a2>Handler</a2></c1>.
你必须在主线程调用任何 view 的任何方法。</e0>如果你在其他线程工作并想在那个线程更新 view 的状态，应该使用 <c1><a2>Handler</a2></c1>。
You must call <c0><a1>getSupportFragmentManager()</a1></c0> to get the <c2><a3>FragmentManager</a3></c2>
你必须调用 <c0><a1>getSupportFragmentManager()</a1></c0> 以获得 <c2><a3>FragmentManager</a3></c2>。
You must handle every Exception in your code in a principled way; the specific handling varies depending on the case.
您必须有原则地处理代码中的每个异常；具体处理方式因情况而异。
You must specify a child element of <c0><paths></c0> for each directory that contains files for which you want content URIs.
您必须为每个包含您需要 content URI 的文件的目录指定 <c0><paths></c0> 的子元素。
You should log only what is needed to gather enough information about what is going on about your component.
您应该只记录收集有关组件的足够信息所需的信息。
You should not call methods that perform these actions on views yourself unless you are actually implementing a <c0><a1>ViewGroup</a1></c0>.
你不应在 view 中调用方法来执行这些操作，除非你实际上继承了一个 <c0><a1>ViewGroup</a1></c0>。
You should still always use the returned Bitmap of the decode method and not assume that reusing the bitmap worked, due to the constraints outlined above and failure situations that can occur.
由于上述限制和可能发生的故障情况，您仍应始终使用解码方法的返回位图，并且不要假定重用位图。
You will almost certainly want to override <c0>onMeasure()</c0> and are also likely to need to override <c1>onDraw()</c1> if you want the component to show something.
如果你想要你的组伯显示一些东西，几乎可以肯定你需要重写 <c0>onMeasure()</c0> 和 <c1>onDraw()</c1> 方法。
You will probably want to create your own event listeners, property accessors and modifiers, and possibly more sophisticated behavior in your component class as well.
你也可以在你的组件类中创建自己的事件监听器，属性的获取、设置方法，也可能更复杂的行为。
Your activity must extend <c0><a1>FragmentActivity</a1></c0>
你的 activity 必须继承 <c0><a1>FragmentActivity</a1></c0>
Your component's <c0>onMeasure()</c0> method should calculate a measurement width and height which will be required to render the component.
你的组件的 <c0>onMeasure()</c0> 方法将计算出一个测量的宽度和高度，以用来呈现该组件。
a float value, representing a ratio between width and height
浮点值，表示宽度与高度之间的比例。
a logical type and that its value should be one of the explicitly
表示一个逻辑类型，并且它的值应该是显示指明的常量之一。
a ratio in the form "width:height"
"width:height" 形式的比例

一个 <t0>StackTraceElement</t0> 数组，每一个元素表示一个堆栈帧。
an exact number
一个精确的数字
